title: How can i get into the beta?
body: Hey I was wondering if any1 knew how I could get Into the beta coz ive been wondering for a while :/ Thanks

replies.body: At the moment those [**PBE signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are still closed for maintenance. We're working on making the whole process much smoother and a bit easier, and in the meantime you can stay up to date on our progress by checking our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news)!
